title: UI: Tick detail panel
description:
Slide-out panel showing full tick details:
- All tick fields (like tk show)
- Workflow section with requires/awaiting/verdict
- Notes history (parsed and formatted)
- Blocker list with status
- Close button

AGENT VERIFICATION:
- Use agent-browser to click a card
- Verify panel slides in from right
- Verify all fields display correctly
- Verify notes are formatted with timestamps
- Take screenshot

HUMAN REVIEW:
- URL: http://localhost:3000 (click any card)
- Verify information is complete and readable
